funFacts.content: Each Ogham letter traditionally corresponds to a tree, like B = Beith (Birch). Known as the 'Celtic Tree Alphabet'.
The Ogham block in Unicode is U+1680–U+169F, with U+1680 'Ogham Space Mark' being the only space character.
